overview.unique_concept: Milindor is where multiple pantheons clash, and magic comes from the friction between conflicting divine powers

creation_myth.title: La Guerra della Genesi
creation_myth.summary: Nel vuoto primordiale esistevano tre Forze Cosmiche: l'Ordine Assoluto, il Caos Primordiale e l'Equilibrio Neutrale. Quando queste forze si scontrarono, dalle loro scintille nacquero i primi dei. Ogni pantheon pretese di essere il legittimo creatore di Milindor, scatenando una guerra eterna che plasma ancora oggi la realtà.
unique_aspects: Multiple pantheons claim ownership of Milindor
Gods can be killed but their power doesn't disappear
Mortals can ascend by claiming dead gods' domains
Divine alliances shift constantly, changing reality

epochs.name: Era del Vuoto Primordiale
epochs.description: Solo le tre Forze Cosmiche esistevano nel nulla assoluto

epochs.name: Era della Prima Scintilla
epochs.description: Nascita dei Pantheon Primordiali dal conflitto delle Forze

epochs.name: Era delle Guerre Divine
epochs.description: I pantheon si combattono per il controllo della realtà nascente

epochs.name: Era degli Eroi Mortali
epochs.description: I mortali iniziano a interferire nei conflitti divini

epochs.name: Era dell'Ascensione
epochs.description: Epoca attuale - mortali possono diventare dei, equilibrio divino instabile

the_celestial_dominion.origin: Born from the Absolute Order cosmic force
the_celestial_dominion.goal: Establish perfect divine rule over all existence
the_celestial_dominion.structure: Rigid hierarchy with clear chains of command

aethros_the_throne_eternal.title: Emperor of the Celestial Dominion
aethros_the_throne_eternal.description: The supreme deity who believes perfect order is the only path to cosmic peace
aethros_the_throne_eternal.symbol: Golden throne with seven ascending steps

lumina_the_radiant_sword.title: Marshal of Divine Justice
lumina_the_radiant_sword.description: Right hand of Aethros, leads the celestial armies

the_primordial_chorus.origin: Emerged from the Primordial Chaos cosmic force
the_primordial_chorus.goal: Liberate all existence from the tyranny of order

vorthane_the_everchanging.title: The Shifting Crown
vorthane_the_everchanging.description: A deity who changes form, personality, and even gender constantly
vorthane_the_everchanging.symbol: Crown that shifts between different shapes

wildara_the_untamed.title: Queen of Primal Instincts
wildara_the_untamed.description: Goddess of natural chaos and untamed wilderness
wildara_the_untamed.symbol: Tree with roots and branches in constant motion

the_void_conspiracy.philosophy: Existence is suffering, only oblivion brings peace
the_void_conspiracy.origin: Spawned from the gaps between Order and Chaos
the_void_conspiracy.goal: Return all existence to the peaceful void

nullex_the_final_silence.title: The End of All Things
nullex_the_final_silence.description: The ultimate nihilistic deity who seeks to unmake reality
nullex_the_final_silence.symbol: Black circle that seems to absorb light

the_balance_keepers.origin: Neutral arbiters who arose to mediate conflicts
the_balance_keepers.goal: Maintain cosmic equilibrium between all forces
the_balance_keepers.structure: Council of equals with rotating leadership

magnamount_the_wise_arbiter.title: The Cosmic Mediator
magnamount_the_wise_arbiter.description: Greatest of the Balance Keepers, patron of the Kai Lords
magnamount_the_wise_arbiter.symbol: Scales with infinite arms, all in perfect balance

the_ascended_mortals.philosophy: Mortals can become gods through deed and will
the_ascended_mortals.goal: Prove that godhood is not birthright but achievement

valorian_the_first_ascended.title: The Mortal Who Became God
valorian_the_first_ascended.description: First mortal to achieve true godhood, inspiration for all heroes

effects_on_milindor: Weather becomes extremely unpredictable near battle sites
Magic users experience power surges and failures
Some mortals spontaneously develop divine powers

the_void_infiltration.nature: Secret war of corruption and nihilism
signs: Areas where plants and animals refuse to live

the_ascension_persecution.cause: Traditional gods see mortal ascension as blasphemy
effects: Heroic mortals face divine trials and tests
Some gods actively try to corrupt or kill potential ascendants

divine_resonance_magic.core_concept: Magic flows from conflicts between divine powers
mechanics: Stronger magic in areas of divine conflict
Spells can 'pick sides' in divine wars
Divine favor enhances related magic schools
Blasphemy against all gods grants forbidden power

the_godslayer_prophecy.description: A mortal destined to kill gods and claim their power
signs: Divine champions dying in impossible ways
Gods becoming paranoid about mortal heroes

the_void_convergence.description: All pantheons consumed by expanding nothingness

the_final_divine_war.description: All pantheons unite in one ultimate conflict
the_final_divine_war.trigger: Discovery of the Prime Divine Spark - original source of all godhood

the_ordered_lands.description: Perfectly planned cities with geometric precision
characteristics: Roads are perfectly straight and maintained
Everyone has a designated role and purpose
the_ordered_lands.dangers: Crushing conformity, thought police, execution for chaos

the_wild_territories.description: Ever-changing wilderness where anything is possible
the_wild_territories.major_feature: The Shifting Forest - trees that walk and talk
the_wild_territories.dangers: Reality instability, chaotic transformations, predatory concepts

the_neutral_zones.description: Areas where opposing forces achieve equilibrium
characteristics: Magic works reliably but not powerfully
the_neutral_zones.role: Kai Monastery locations and diplomatic centers

the_dead_zones.description: Areas where existence is slowly being erased
